mailSubject: Updated Checklist and PEP Screening Analysis for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this email finds you well.

I have analyzed the PEP screening data and updated the checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC, as requested. Below are the key details from the PEP screening analysis:

- **PEP Screening Results:**
    - **Michael O. Barry:** Validated as a Domestic – Federal PEP with a match score of 92% and a high-risk rating.
    - **Fatima El-Sayed:** Validated as a Foreign – Senior Government PEP with a match score of 87% and a medium-risk rating.
    - **Olga Petrova:** Validated as a Foreign – Political PEP with a match score of 96% and a high-risk rating.
    - **Johnathan Lee:** Not a PEP, with a match score of 15% and a low-risk rating.

Additionally, I've updated the checklist to reflect the validation of the "Company PEP Screening" item. Please find the updated checklist below:

| Checklist Item                     | Status     | Comment                                                               | Source                              |
|------------------------------------|------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof             | Validated  | Utility Bill validated from London City Utilities.                   | DIM_CompanyAddressProof            |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro Survey data available for 2020-2022.     | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details   | Validated  | Bank account and postal details confirmed.                           | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails    |
| Company Directorship              | Pending    | No additional details found for directorship verification.           | DIM_CompanyDirectorship            |
| Company Tax Documentation         | Validated  | Tax documents verified; pending additional info for certain docs.    | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments            |
| Company Regulatory Compliance     | Validated  | Compliance confirmed across multiple regulatory spheres.             | DIM_CompanyRegulatory              |
| Company Business Scope            | Validated  | Business scope verified; global operations and diverse services.     | DIM_CompanyBusinessScope           |
| Company PEP Screening             | Validated  | PEP screening data validated using the attachment provided.          | Attachment                         |
| Company Revenue Details           | Validated  | Revenue data available for 2021-2023; record growth confirmed.       | RagAgent                           |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated  | Market capitalization data available for 2021-2023.                  | RagAgent                           |

If you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,  
Surbhi Nagori  
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com  
J.P. Morgan Securities PLC
